## Article Content

HOME
GIFT CARDS
SELLING & REDEEMING GIFT CARDS
Applying Discounts on Gift Cards

This article covers how to apply a discount on a gift card purchase. You can also create a gift card promotion to sell discounted gift cards.

To apply a discount on a gift card during checkout, enter the gift card value and select Set custom price.

Enter the discounted price. You can select Change price to add a percentage discount.

Select Go To Payments and complete the checkout as you normally would.
